name: cursively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you write cursively, you write with rounded letters that are joined together: write cursively I learnt to write cursively before I learned to print.written cursively It is difficult to see where one letter finishes and another begins when the word "minimum" is written cursively.
More examplesFewer examplesMost people who injure a dominant hand can usually learn to print with their other hand, but few can write cursively.The samples of handwriting above are all written cursively.For most people, writing cursively is faster than printing.
